body_html: @ezyang I saw the commit, while it's nice to have a dynamic way to figure out which flag works or not for different architectures, once you start adding more flags that you want to test , then you end up running the compile several iterations to find which combinations of flags work. For now , its still simple since it ends up to a max of three executions of the compiler. But it becomes more complicated as you add more flags in the future. I'm OK either way, all I need is to get this to work on ppc64le. Let me know what you decide.
